parameters.name: AliyunLang
parameters.description: The language. Valid values: zh and en. Default value: zh.

parameters.name: FeatureName
parameters.description: The feature name. Valid values: app-agent-pilot, metric-agent, ebpf-agent, and service-check.

parameters.name: Values
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable service discovery. For PodAnnotation, set the value to run or mini. For PodMonitor and ServiceMonitor, set the value to true or false.
